Class.Name: Barbarian
Class.Description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Bard
Class.Description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Cleric
Class.Description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature – moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning – and adopting the forms of animals.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Druid
Class.Description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature – moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning – and adopting the forms of animals.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Fighter
Class.Description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Monk
Class.Description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Paladin
Class.Description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Ranger
Class.Description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Rouge
Class.Description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Sorcerer
Class.Description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuation, and Religon

Class.Name: Warlock
Class.Description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival

Class.Name: Wizard
Class.Description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival
